block.urushi.cupric_oxide_kawara_roof_45: Cupric Oxide Kawara Roof for Stairs
block.urushi.cupric_oxide_kawara_roof_22: Cupric Oxide Kawara Roof for Slab
info.urushi.chiseled_lacquer_log: Right-click Lacquer Log with flint or any tools to obtain.
info.urushi.kitsunebi2: Give Abura-age to a fox to obtain.
info.urushi.fox_hopper: The attraction range is about 3 blocks above.
info.urushi.framed_block1: The textures are connected with each other by default.
info.urushi.framed_block3: to place blocks that aren't connected to blocks in default mode.
info.urushi.iron_ingot: Place it on a block and use Hammer to smash it.
info.urushi.roof_45: Place it on any kind of Stairs.
info.urushi.roof_225: Place it on any kind of Slabs.
info.urushi.saltandsand: In Ocean or Beach biomes, Sand locate above sea leavel transform into this when Water attached.
info.urushi.dirtfurnace: Ignite and place Rice Cauldron above.
info.urushi.ricecauldron: After placing Dirt Furnace below, put Raw Rice inside.
info.urushi.climbing_rope: Set a long rope to low ground or underground.
info.urushi.wagasa: Eliminates falling damage and decreases falling speed while holding.
info.urushi.rawrice: Use Rice Ears on Senbakoki to obtain 2 Raw Rice items.
info.urushi.rawurushi: Use Bowl on Chiseled Lacquer Log to obtain.
info.urushi.placeablefood: Right-click while sneaking to place food on ground.
block.urushi.grass_block_with_fallen_red: Grass Block With Fallen Red Leaves
block.urushi.grass_block_with_fallen_ora: Grass Block With Fallen Orange Leaves
block.urushi.grass_block_with_fallen_yel: Grass Block With Fallen Yellow Leaves
block.urushi.grass_block_with_fallen_jap: Grass Block With Fallen Japanese Apricot Leaves
block.urushi.grass_block_with_fallen_sak: Grass Block With Fallen Kobore Sakura Leaves
info.urushi.ghost_block: It becomes passable and translucent when recieved redstone signal.
info.urushi.ghost_block2: Mimics the normal block when not provided redstone signal.
info.urushi.miningSpeedChanger1: While in inventory, digging speed change
info.urushi.sandpaper_block: File neighbor blocks when moved by Piston.
block.urushi.kakuriyo_grass_block_with_f: Kakuriyo Grass Block With Fallen Red Leaves
Kakuriyo Grass Block With Fallen Orange Leaves
Kakuriyo Grass Block With Fallen Yellow Leaves
Kakuriyo Grass Block With Fallen Japanese Apricot Leaves
Kakuriyo Grass Block With Fallen Kobore Sakura Leaves
info.urushi.under_development: Now under development. Wait for the future update!
info.urushi.shichirin1: Put fuel (Coal, Charcoal, or Bamboo Charcoal) inside, ignite by amber, and use Uchiwa to control!
info.urushi.shichirin2: The intensity of the fire does not affect the cooking result for the first 5 seconds.
info.urushi.shichirin3: Make the duration of ☆ and the duration of ★ as equal as possible!
info.urushi.magatama1: Store Reiryoku inside it by right-click on Onusa.
info.urushi.magatama2: By placing it inside inventory, various items become usable.
info.urushi.sanbo: Items can be crafted in conjunction with a Birch Altar.
info.urushi.sacred_rock2: When you place a block of specific element in front of this, the block will be transformed into Reiryoku.
info.urushi.sacred_rock3: The face which has long paper is the front.
info.urushi.emitter2: Send a redstone signal to be idle.
info.urushi.emitter3: Curve the Reiryoku signals with a Mirror.
info.urushi.emitter4: Place a Onusa at Reiyoku crossing points.
info.urushi.tank2: Place this at crossing points of Reiryoku signals.
info.urushi.mirror2: You can also curve signals diagonally.
info.urushi.mirror3: Right-click to change the angle horizontally.
info.urushi.mirror4: Shift+Right-click to change the angle vertically.
info.urushi.element_crafting_table1: Can process Ritual crafting by placing four Birch Sanbos around this.
info.urushi.element_crafting_table2: You need to send specific type of Reiryoku to start crafting.
info.urushi.amber_igniter1: Consumes 10 FIRE element Reiryoku to ignite a Shichirin Stove.
info.urushi.uchiwa3: Consumes 1 WOOD element Reiryoku to manipulate the fire of Shichirin Stove.
info.urushi.uchiwa2: Consumes 1 WOOD element Reiryoku per 10 block.
info.urushi.kitsunebi3: Consumes 10 FIRE element Reiryoku to place or toss this.
info.urushi.wagasa2: Consumes WOOD element Reiryoku to use.
info.urushi.wood_amber: Drop form Petrified Log With Wood Amber
info.urushi.fire_amber: Drop from Petrified Log With Fire Amber
info.urushi.earth_amber: Drop from Petrified Log WIth Earth Amber
info.urushi.metal_amber: Drop from Petrified Log With Metal Amber
info.urushi.water_amber: Drop from Petrified Log With Water Amber
info.urushi.petrified_log_with_wood_ambe: Place a Yomi Stone or a Cobbled Yomi Stone on a Chiseled Lacquer Log, with a Chicken around, and wait to obtain.
info.urushi.petrified_log_with_fire_ambe: Place a Yomi Stone or a Cobbled Yomi Stone on a Chiseled Lacquer Log, with a Sheep around, and wait to obtain.
info.urushi.petrified_log_with_earth_amb: Place a Yomi Stone or a Cobbled Yomi Stone on a Chiseled Lacquer Log, with a Cow around, and wait to obtain.
info.urushi.petrified_log_with_metal_amb: Place a Yomi Stone or a Cobbled Yomi Stone on a Chiseled Lacquer Log, with a Horse around, and wait to obtain.
info.urushi.petrified_log_with_water_amb: Place a Yomi Stone or a Cobbled Yomi Stone on a Chiseled Lacquer Log, with a Pig around, and wait to obtain.
block.urushi.light_blue_stained_wooden_c: Light Blue Stained Wooden Cabinetry Slab
block.urushi.light_gray_stained_wooden_c: Light Gray Stained Wooden Cabinetry Slab
block.urushi.doubled_light_blue_stained_: Doubled Light Blue Stained Wooden Cabinetry
block.urushi.doubled_light_gray_stained_: Doubled Light Gray Stained Wooden Cabinetry
advancements.urushi.root.title: Urushi
advancements.urushi.root.description: A Japanese style architecture and magic mod
advancements.urushi.raw_urushi.title: Squishy-Sticky
advancements.urushi.raw_urushi.descripti: Have some Raw Urushi in your inventory
advancements.urushi.climbing_rope.title: Acrophobia
advancements.urushi.japanese_timber_bamb: Once upon a time, in the bamboo forest...
advancements.urushi.kakuriyo_dirt.title: Kamikakushi
advancements.urushi.ghost_core.title: Where are the Lazy Bones?
Craft some torch by Lantern Plant Fruit
advancements.urushi.sacred_rock.title: Naturism
advancements.urushi.emitter_tier1.title: Make Your Move
advancements.urushi.mirror_tier1.title: Ray Tracing
advancements.urushi.tank_tier1.title: Storing Technique
advancements.urushi.magatama.title: I Ritual Summon a Magatama!
advancements.urushi.wagasa.title: Parachuting
advancements.urushi.uchiwa.title: Summertime Memories
advancements.urushi.amber_igniter.title: Yoshii(TM) Flint, Best Flint
advancements.urushi.shichirin.title: Burn
advancements.urushi.kitsunebi.title: Ghost Light
advancements.urushi.fox_hopper.title: What Does the Fox Play?
item.urushi.cheese_gyudon_with_onsen_egg: Cheese Gyudon with Hot Spring Egg
info.urushi.onsen_egg: Throw a Egg into Hot Spring Water to obtain.
info.urushi.rock: This will transform into Weathered Rock when a Pointed Dripstone is placed above.
info.urushi.sazare_ishi: When Pointed Dripstone is placed above a Rock, the Rock will transform into this.
info.urushi.slot_fryer: Input: ABOVE, Fuel: SIDES, Output: BELOW
info.urushi.slot_shichirin: Input: ABOVE, Fuel: SIDES, Output: BELOW
info.urushi.katana: Right-click to leaps foward and sweep attack by dealing half of damage.
info.urushi.wood_element_paper: Use Shide to a WOOD Element block to obtain.
info.urushi.fire_element_paper: Use Shide to a FIRE Element block to obtain.
info.urushi.earth_element_paper: Use Shide to an Earth Element block to obtain.
info.urushi.metal_element_paper: Use Shide to a Metal Element block to obtain.
info.urushi.water_element_paper: Use Shide to a Water Element block to obtain.
info.urushi.hammer: Right-click on blocks to change the texture conection.
info.urushi.hokora: Right-click or use a Hopper to insert the required item to generate 5 Reiryoku.
info.urushi.japanese_cedar_sapling: Generates on hills and in the Kakuriyo Dimension
info.urushi.lacquer_sapling: Generates in Forests, spawner chests and chests in villages on Plains.
patchouli.urushi.kakuriyo_book.name: Trip to the Underroot
patchouli.urushi.kakuriyo_book.subtitle: Utsushiyo Banare
patchouli.urushi.kakuriyo_book.landing_t: The guide that helps you travel through the worlds of Urushi. Ready for your $(#cc3345)afterlife$(#000)?
patchouli.urushi.urushi_book.name: About Urushi
patchouli.urushi.urushi_book.subtitle: Japanese Blocks!
patchouli.urushi.urushi_book.landing_tex: Urushi adds many Japanese blocks. Also, urushi has magic contents.
item.urushi.green_onion_and_raw_egg_gyud: Gyudon with Green Onion and Raw Egg
item.urushi.mustard_leaf_and_cod_caviar_: Gyudon with Mustard Leaf, Cod Caviar and Mayonnaise
info.urushi.crop: This is a crop and can be planted on Farmland.
info.urushi.fermentation_barrel: Place, fill and left to ferment
info.urushi.fermentation_barrel2: Right-click on Fermentation Barrel with at least 8 items to obtain
info.urushi.rice_malt: Put 8 Rice in Fermentation Barrel to obtain
info.urushi.miso: Put 8 Shikomi Miso in Fermentation Barrel to obtain
info.urushi.auto_crafting_table: You can automate craftings at this workbench.
info.urushi.auto_crafting_table2: If there is a chest or other storage block on the direction of the △ mark, the result item is automatically carried out to that storage block. If not, the result item is dropped as an item.
info.urushi.bamboo_cup: This resembles a Glass Bottle, but can be filled with liquids and can be stacked up to 64.
info.urushi.water_bamboo_cup: As with Watter Bottle, can be turned into Mud when used against Dirt
info.urushi.milk_bamboo_cup: Like the Milk Bucket, the effect disappears when you drink it.
info.urushi.udon: Place Noodle Dough and cut it with a Noodle Knife to obtain.
info.urushi.alkaline_noodles: Place Alkaline Noodle Dough and cut it with a Noodle Knife to obtain.
info.urushi.bars: When you place on the ground or ceiling, it doesn't connect to the wall. When you place on a horizontal side, it connects to the wall.
key.urushi.connectionKey: Switch Texture Connections for Framed Blocks
block.urushi.vertical_blue_galvanised_ir: Vertical Blue Galvanised Iron Plate Slab
block.urushi.vertical_red_galvanised_iro: Vertical Red Galvanised Iron Plate Slab
block.urushi.vertical_rusted_galvanised_: Vertical Rusted Galvanised Iron Plate Slab
info.urushi.katana2: Rushing attacks deal half the normal attack damage to all nearby mobs.
info.urushi.parapet: Tightly fitted when placing on half blocks.
info.urushi.invisible_redstone_inputs: Visible only when you hold this block in your hand.
entity.urushi.cheese_gyudon_with_onsen_e: Cheese Gyudon with Hot Spring Egg
entity.urushi.green_onion_and_raw_egg_gy: Gyudon with Green Onion and Raw Egg
entity.urushi.mustard_leaf_and_cod_cavia: Gyudon with Mustard Leaf, Cod Caviar and Mayonnaise
info.urushi.visualization_goggles: When equipped, the path of Reiryoku transport becomes visible.
info.urushi.jufu_stamp1: Solving puzzles in the structure of the wood circle, you can get one of the jufu stamps corresponding to the color of the puzzle you have aligned.
info.urushi.jufu_stamp2: This stamp remains when crafting a Jufu with a Element Altar.
info.urushi.jump_jufu1: Launch mobs and inflict fall damage.
info.urushi.lava_generation_jufu1: Generate Lava at the point of impact.
info.urushi.growth_jufu1: Give bonemeal effect to blocks in an area of 11×11×11.
info.urushi.mountain_creation_jufu1: Produce a sphere of Dirt and let it fall.
info.urushi.mountain_creation_jufu2: It is useful for creating mountains and manipulating the shape of the land.
info.urushi.fluid_erasion_jufu1: Erase fluids in an area of 11 ×11. (except for Grass Block)
info.urushi.spike_jufu1: Generate metal spikes and hurts mobs.
info.urushi.spike_jufu2: The damage by the spikes is treated as an attack by the player, so the mob drops experiences and rare drops.
info.urushi.newer_version_released: A new version of Urushi is released!
info.urushi.newer_version_released_hover: Click here to open CurseForge Urushi web page.
info.urushi.silkworm_farm1: Generate Cocoons from Silkworms and Leaves or Saplings.
info.urushi.silkworm_farm2: Import Silkworms from top surface, import Leaves or Saplings from the side, and export Cocoons from bottom surface by using Hppers.
info.urushi.silkworm: Generates in loot chests in spawner dungeons, villages, and in Kakuriyo dimension.
info.urushi.senbakoki: Use Rice Ears on Senbakoki to obtain Raw Rice and Straw.
info.urushi.rice_ball: The above items can be placed as ingredients by stacking them on top of the Rice Ball in the inventory. When an ingredient is included, something happens when you eat it, depending on the type of ingredient.
info.urushi.rice_ball_with_filling: This has a filling. Something will happen when you eat.
info.urushi.kettle: Place Hibachi, Campfire, or Furnace below and put Tea Leaf and a Water Bamboo Cup in it to make a Green Tea.
info.urushi.hibachi: Put a Kettle above to make a green tea.
#comment-furigana-start: ↓No need to translate furiganas. Keep these lines for diff experience with ja_jp
info.urushi.furigana.ariake_andon: 有明行燈(ありあけあんどん)
info.urushi.furigana.kasuga_tourou: 春日灯篭(かすがとうろう)
info.urushi.furigana.manjusyage: 曼珠沙華(まんじゅしゃげ)
info.urushi.furigana.shitamiita: 下見板張り(したみいたばり)
info.urushi.furigana.takebushiramma: 竹節欄間(たけぶしらんま)
info.urushi.furigana.musourenji: 無双連子(むそうれんじ)
info.urushi.furigana.ramma_shoji: 欄間障子(らんましょうじ)
info.urushi.furigana.janomegasa: 蛇の目傘(じゃのめがさ)
#comment-furigana-end: ↑No need to translate furiganas. Keep these lines for diff experience with ja_jp
info.urushi.same_as_composter: You can put items not only by right-clicking but also by using a hopper like a Composter.
info.urushi.fermentation_barrel_1: You can craft 8x Rice Malt from 8x Rice, and 8x Miso from 8x Shikomi Miso.
info.urushi.fermentation_barrel_2: Put a Rice, a Rice Malt, and a Water Bamboo Cup, and use a Glass Bottle to the barrel to craft a Sake Bottle.
info.urushi.ochoko_1: Give a Resistance effect and a Slowness effect.
info.urushi.ochoko_2: Effects will be stronger and the duration will be longer if you drink many times.
info.urushi.sake: Put a Rice, a Rice Malt, and a Water Bamboo Cup in a Fermentation Barrel and use a Glass Bottle to the barrel to obtain.
info.urushi.noodle: Holding the Noodle Knife in the main hand and the dough in the off hand and holding down the right mouse button makes it easier to cut noodles.
info.urushi.rice_ball_with_filling_rando: The effect changes with every trade
info.urushi.crush_jufu1: Summon Anvil above the mob and hurt that.
info.urushi.crush_jufu2: The damage by the anvil is treated as an attack by the player, so the mob drops experiences and rare drops.
info.urushi.explosion_jufu2: The damage by the exposion is treated as an attack by the player, so the mob drops experiences and rare drops.
book.urushi.chronicles1: This is unerdevelopment. Do not translate this part.
info.urushi.crop2: Till Grass Blocks using a hoe to obtain.
info.urushi.tea_bush: Trade with Kakuriyo Resident (Cook) at Kakuriyo Town to obtain.
info.urushi.coin: Placeable at the same position up to 6.
info.urushi.rainwater_tank1: When water is added, water can be taken out infinitely with buckets, etc.
info.urushi.rainwater_tank2: You can craft Mud from Dirt and any Concrete from Concrete Powder, and oxidize Copper Block and Cut Copper by using this.
advancements.urushi.silkworm.title: Generate String
advancements.urushi.silk_thread.title: Encouragement of New Industry
advancements.urushi.rice.title: Eat Rice!
advancements.urushi.sushi.title: 3, 2, 1, Hello！
